QuestData.Title: Close Enough to Touch
QuestData.Description: He is near, $r, I can feel it.$b$bWe must search Shala'nir for Malfurion. If we do not find him soon, I fear he will be lost to me forever.$b$bI was unsure of your worth when first we met. I know now that you will not fail me.$b$bI am... grateful.

Objectives.Objective: Search for Malfurion at the Inn
Search for Malfurion near the Lake
Search for Malfurion in the Village
